name: WTF Trolls
description:
WTF Trolls is an top down shoot 'em up with gameplay inspired by games like Battle City, Bomberman or Commando. That means the game is focused especially on multiplayer, co-op or vs, but also can be enjoyed solo. Where you and your friens takes the role of one of the 5 different trolls and shoot the f**k up all the troll enemies until reach and kill the Troll chief of each one of the four zones you travel on.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Destructable enviroment (almost all can be destroyed), create new paths, find your way or whatever you want.
  • Up to 4 players can participate in any game mode.
  • guide the trolls around 40 levels in Story mode around 4 different scenarios.
  • Story mode is too easy for you and your friends? try arcade mode. Only 5 shared lives between all players and another 40 levels to beat. No life ups, no continues, no check points and nothing like that.
  • +10 competitive game modes to play aganist your friends (VS and Team VS).
  • You love secrets? try to find 'em all!!!

Pre-Purchase bonuses:

  • Latest build of the game
  • Full quality digital game poster
  • Full .MP3 and .WAV OST

Estimated Release Date: 2016
